results.name: Primes of the form 80*R_n + 1, where R_n is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comment: The number of 8's in each term is given by the corresponding term of A056664 and so the first term too large to include above is 888...8881 (with 138 8's).
Primes of the form (8*10^n - 71)/9. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 16 2010
link: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 88...881.
Index entries for primes involving repunits
results.author: _Rick L. Shepherd_, Mar 02 2004
